properties.description: Creating the view for PBI to show contract data

content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.schemas
                WHERE   name = 'mipins' )
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [mipins]');
GO

--CREATE VIEW FOR CONTRACT--

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW mipins.vw_mipins_hr_contract
AS

SELECT DISTINCT

CASE 
    WHEN ContractCode = 'AG' THEN '1'
    WHEN ContractCode = 'AP' THEN '2'
    WHEN ContractCode = 'CT' THEN '3'
    WHEN ContractCode = 'FT' THEN '4'
    WHEN ContractCode = 'LP' THEN '5'      
    WHEN ContractCode = 'LU' THEN '6'      
    WHEN ContractCode = 'NE' THEN '7'      
    WHEN ContractCode = 'NO' THEN '8'  
    WHEN ContractCode = 'NS' THEN '9'    
    WHEN ContractCode = 'PE' THEN '10'      
    WHEN ContractCode = 'SP' THEN '11'
    WHEN ContractCode = 'SU' THEN '12'
END                 AS dim_work_contract_key,
ContractCode        AS WorkContractCode,
Description         AS WorkContractDesc,
IsActive            AS IsActive,
IngestionDate       AS IngestionDate,
ValidTo             AS ValidTo

FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].hr_contract_dim


GO
